what: The Package Determines The Winner Of A Poker Game
title: The Package Determines The Winner Of A Poker Game
text: ‘poker777’ package provides function determine winner poker game two players based hands. evaluates player’s hand according standard poker rules, including identifying royal flushes, straights, flushes, pairs, high cards. function validates input hands ensure contain exactly five cards correct format determining winner. package useful analyzing poker games settling disputes friendly games simulations.
